Source code for pymam.soundsynth

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
import numpy as np
from scipy.io.wavfile import write
from scipy.io.wavfile import read
    

[docs]def wavread(file_name):
    fs, y = read(file_name)
    return fs,np.array(y,dtype=np.float64)/(2**15-1)



[docs]def wavwrite(file_name,x,fs = 44100):
    x = x/np.max(np.abs(x))*0.9
    write(file_name,fs,np.array(x*(2**15-1),dtype=np.int16))



[docs]def time_array(start,dur,fs=44100):
	t = np.arange(0 , np.floor(fs*dur) )/fs+start       # array de tiempos
	return t



[docs]def envolvente(amps,durs,fs=44100):
    
    t = time_array(0,sum(durs),fs)
    return np.interp(t,np.cumsum(np.array(durs)),amps),t

    

[docs]def dcremove(x):
    
    return x-np.mean(x)
